name: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe - Booster Course Pass (DLC)
name_original: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe - Booster Course Pass (DLC)
description:
Get an additional game’s worth of courses with the Mario Kart™ 8 Deluxe – Booster Course Pass!

A total of 48 more courses are racing to the Mario Kart 8 Deluxe game as paid DLC*. The brand-new Yoshi’s Island course will take you through flower-covered hills and over cloud-dotted skies inspired by the Super Mario World™ 2: Yoshi’s Island™ game. Take a few laps around Tour Singapore Speedway and carve down the hills of Wii DK Summit in courses returning from past Mario Kart games. Content will release in 6 waves of 8 courses until the end of 2023.

Hit the road as Birdo!

Unlock Birdo by downloading the Mario Kart 8 Deluxe – Booster Course Pass DLC* and use her in all modes! Choose from a rainbow of color variations—9 to be exact—and race to the finish in style.
